what: Create and train SCVI model — CreateSCVI
title: Create and train SCVI model — CreateSCVI
text: function create train scvi model.

title: Create and train SCVI model — CreateSCVI
code: CreateSCVI(object, ...)  # S3 method for Seurat CreateSCVI(   object,   main_layer = "counts",   max_epochs = NULL,   use_gpu = NULL,   train = TRUE,   early_stopping = FALSE )

title: Create and train SCVI model — CreateSCVI
text: max_epochs Number passes dataset. NULL, defaults min(round(c(round((20000 / n_cells) * 400), 400))) use_gpu Use default GPU available (NULL TRUE), index GPU use (int), name GPU (string), use CPU (FALSE). train TRUE model created trained. early_stopping Perform early stopping.

title: Create and train SCVI model — CreateSCVI
text: Return trained SCVI model.

title: scvi-tools single cell — RunSCVI
text: Run dimentionality reduction usinc SCVI model

title: scvi-tools single cell — RunSCVI
code: RunSCVI(object, ...)  # S3 method for Seurat RunSCVI(   object,   scvi_model = NULL,   reduction.name = "scvi",   reduction_key = "scvi_" )

title: scvi-tools single cell — RunSCVI
text: object seurat object ... parameters scvi_model scvi_model

title: scvi-tools single cell — RunSCVI
text: Return Seurat object computed embedding         measure computed. downstream Seurat analyses,         use reduction='scvi'.

title: Install scvi-tools Python Package — install_scvi
code: install_scvi(   envname = "r-reticulate",   method = "auto",   conda = "auto",   pip = TRUE,   ... )  install_scvi(   envname = "r-reticulate",   method = "auto",   conda = "auto",   pip = TRUE,   ... )

title: Install scvi-tools Python Package — install_scvi
text: envname Name environment install packages method Installation method. default, "auto" automatically finds method work local environment. Change default force specific installation method. Note "virtualenv" method available Windows. conda Path conda executable ("auto" find conda using PATH conventional install locations). pip Install pip, possible. ... Additional arguments passed conda_install() virtualenv_install().

title: Install scvi-tools Python Package — install_scvi
text: Linux OS X "virtualenv" method used default ("conda" used virtualenv available). Windows, "conda" method always used. Linux OS X "virtualenv" method used default ("conda" used virtualenv available). Windows, "conda" method always used.
